name: Air Fryer Sweet Garlic Chicken
preparation:
1. Preheat air fryer to 390Â° F.
  2. Cut sweet potatoes into small cubes; you should have about 3 cups.
  3. In a large bowl, add sweet potatoes, oil, chicken, and seasoning. Toss until well coated.
  4. Arrange chicken in single layer in basket. Cook 15 min or until cooked through, flipping halfway through. Remove from basket and keep warm.
  5. Arrange sweet potatoes in a single layer in basket. Cook 10 min or until tender, shaking basket halfway through.
